nodes.text: Jory K. Prum was a former member of the LucasArts in-house sound team. He has been credited as a cutscene sound mixer for Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic. He coordinated the sound for Star Wars: Demolition, was involved with Star Wars: Starfighter, and was a sound assistant for Star Wars: X-Wing Alliance, among many others. He died in a motorcycle accident in 2016.
